page.title: 18Telephones in Hundred Acre.
page.content: We asked our class of 30, who all have telephones, if they had got a push-button telephone. Only 5 of them had got one, all the rest have dial telephones. The telephone boxes are red in Streetly. It is l0p. for about 3 minutes and after 6 p.m. you have about 5 minutes for 10p. When we telephone our friends we cannot see each other. When we ring 999 an operater answers and says "What do you require, Police, Ambulance or Fire Brigade?" and we tell her who we want then she telephones them up and they come as quickly as they can. {by Mandy Lewis, Karen Morrison, Zoe {Booth (9) and Sarah Watson (8) }
